extDescription.message: Usa tu modelo de IA corriendo localmente para asistirte en la navegación.

contextSaveToNotesOpeningSidebar.message: Abriendo la barra lateral para guardar la nota...

contextSaveToNotesNoSelection.message: Select text first to save to Notes.

hfSendPageRejected.message: [tldw] Page send request rejected by tldw_server

hfSendPageErrorWithDetail.message: [tldw] Failed to send this page to tldw_server: $1. Check Settings → tldw server and try again.

hfSendPageError.message: [tldw] Failed to send this page to tldw_server. Check Settings → tldw server and try again.

hfSendPageSuccess.message: [tldw] Sent page to tldw_server for processing

hfSendPageException.message: [tldw] Something went wrong while sending this page to tldw_server. Check that your tldw_server and the extension are running, then try again.

hfPullInProgress.message: [tldw Assistant] A model pull request is already in progress. Please wait for it to finish before starting another one.

hfPullConfirm.message: [tldw Assistant] Do you want to send a request to your tldw_server to pull the "$1" model? This is independent of the huggingface.co website. Your server will start pulling the model after you confirm.

hfPullSending.message: [tldw Assistant] Sending a request to your tldw_server to pull "$1". Check the extension icon or your tldw_server logs for progress.

hfPullErrorWithDetail.message: [tldw Assistant] Failed to send a pull request for "$1": $2. Check Settings → tldw server and try again.

hfPullError.message: [tldw Assistant] Failed to send a pull request for "$1". Check Settings → tldw server and try again.

hfPullSuccess.message: [tldw Assistant] Request sent to your tldw_server to pull "$1". Monitor the extension icon or tldw_server logs for status.

hfPullException.message: [tldw Assistant] Something went wrong while sending a pull request for "$1" to your tldw_server. Check that your tldw_server and the extension are running, then try again.
